turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can I help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'll like to order two small pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what did you want on those two small pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One was just pepperoni and the other with pepperoni bacon and feather cheese, and I'd like both of those with gluten free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your order of 2 small pizzas, 1 with pepperoni and 1 with pepperoni, bacon and feta cheese. Both pizzas with gluten free crust, comes out to $24.55.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, I've submitted your order. It'll be ready for pick up in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you need assistance with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that'll be it. Thank you.
